\documentclass[english]{article}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[utf8]{luainputenc}
\usepackage{geometry}
\geometry{verbose,lmargin=1cm,rmargin=1cm}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{esint}
\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}

\title{Homework 5: Trigonometric Integrals}


\author{Alexander Gould, Section 3}


\date{September 12, 2014}

\maketitle
9.

\[
\int\sin^{2}xdx=\frac{1}{2}\int\left(1-\cos2x\right)dx=\frac{1}{4}\int\left(1-\cos u\right)du=\frac{1}{4}\left(u-\sin u\right)+C=\boxed{\frac{x}{2}-\frac{\sin x}{4}+C}
\]


11.

\[
\int\sin^{3}xdx=\int\sin^{2}x\sin xdx=\int\left(1-\cos^{2}x\right)\sin xdx=\int-1+u^{2}du=\frac{u^{3}}{3}-u+C=\boxed{\frac{\cos^{3}x}{3}-\cos x+C}
\]


13.

\[
\int\sin^{2}x\cos^{2}xdx=\int\frac{\sin^{2}2x}{4}=\int\frac{1-\cos4x}{8}=\boxed{\frac{x}{8}-\frac{\sin4x}{32}+C}
\]


14.

\[
\int\sin^{3}x\cos^{5}xdx=\int\cos x\sin^{5}x-\sin^{7}x=\int u^{5}-u^{7}du=\frac{u^{6}}{6}-\frac{u^{8}}{8}+C=\boxed{\frac{\sin^{6}x}{6}-\frac{\sin^{8}x}{8}+C}
\]


16.

\[
\int\sin^{-\frac{3}{2}}\cos^{3}xdx=\boxed{\sin^{\frac{5}{2}}x\left(\frac{\cos2x}{9}+\frac{13}{45}\right)+C}
\]


19.

\[
\int\tan^{2}xdx=\int\sec^{2}x-1dx=\boxed{\tan x-x+C}
\]


20.

\[
6\int\sec^{4}xdx=6\int\sec^{2}x\sec^{2}xdx=6\int\left(\tan^{2}x+1\right)\sec^{2}xdx=6\left(\int\sec^{2}x\tan^{2}xdx+\int\sec^{2}dx\right)=\boxed{2\tan^{3}x+6\tan x+C}
\]


21.

\[
\int\tan^{3}4xdx=\int\tan^{2}4x*\tan4xdx=\int\left(\sec^{2}4x-1\right)\tan4xdx=\int\left(\sec^{2}4x\right)\tan4x-\tan4xdx=\boxed{\frac{\tan^{2}4x}{8}-\frac{\ln\left|\sec4x\right|}{4}+C}
\]


25.

\[
\int\sec^{2}x\tan^{\frac{1}{2}}x=\boxed{\frac{2}{3}\tan^{\frac{3}{2}}x+C}
\]


30.

\[
\int\tan^{5}x\sec^{4}x=\int\tan^{5}x\sec^{2}x\sec^{2}xdx=\int\tan^{5}\left(1+\tan^{2}x\right)\sec^{2}xdx=\int\left(\tan^{5}x+\tan^{7}x\right)\sec^{2}xdx=\boxed{\frac{\tan^{6}x}{6}+\frac{\tan^{8}x}{8}+C}
\]

\end{document}
